It took me about three or four weeks to fully recover from my c-section. I had to have one because my son was a high risk. If you have someone that will be able to help you bath and do the baby laundry for two weeks after your baby is born, I highly recommend a c-section. It is safer for the baby and mother all the way around.

I had one with my first. You will definitely need help for at least 2 weeks. One thing I do suggest is that if you have one try and walk around the hospital like the day after..I did it and recovery seemed to be quicker,.try not to let it keep you completely down
